titleStmt.title: An epistle from the people in scorn called Quakers to all people upon the earth to read over that they may see what the people called Quakers hold concerning God, Christ, his death, his resurrection, his blood, concerning his offering, redemption, salvation, justification, faith, and hope.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.
Hookes, Ellis, d. 1681.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
